Worcester.Church of Our Savior, Worcester:
Church of Our Savior (Armenian: Ուսթըրի Սուրբ Փրկիչ եկեղեցի) is an Armenian Apostolic church in Worcester, Massachusetts, known for being the first Armenian church in the Western hemisphere.
The church was built in 1891. Armenians from the throughout the Northeastern United States contributed with money to erect the first Armenian church in the area and in the country.
